title: Odile Renaud-Basso - Wikipedia
snippet: Odile Renaud-Basso (born 2 June 1965) is a French civil servant who has been serving as president of the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development since 2020. From 2016 to 2020, she served as head of the Direction générale du Trésor.

title: Odile Renaud-Basso - European Commission
snippet: Ms Renaud-Basso is a graduate of the Paris Institut d’Etudes Politiques (Sciences Po) and an Ecole Nationale d’Administration alum. She also attended Harvard University’s John F.

title: OFFICIAL USE OFFICIAL USE Odile RENAUD BASSO Nationality: French
snippet: Odile RENAUD BASSO · Nationality: French · Date of birth: 2 June 1965 · Married, four children · Languages: French, English, Spanish · Professional experience · Since 2020: President, European Bank for Reconstruction and Development, London · 2016 - 2020: Director General, French Treasury, ...

title: Odile Renaud Basso | European Stability Mechanism
snippet: Odile Renaud Basso became the Director General of the French Treasury in 2016.

title: Odile Renaud-Basso | World Bank Live
snippet: She took up the role in November 2020, replacing Sir Suma Chakrabarti, who had stepped down in July 2020 after serving two full four-year terms. She is the first ever woman head of a multilateral development bank.
